name: Odette's Magical Menagerie
description:
Meet Odette. She's a witch, but not a very good one, and she doesn't have a heart of gold as much as a heart that might shine a little if you rubbed it really hard. And it's up to her to stop a team of enigmatic cultists from resurrecting a long-dead sorcerer-king.

Credits:

  • Game: Willow
  • Character bust art: Luca
  • Cover art: Cassie
  • Download soundtrack

RGSS Script Credits:

  • Physics, lighting scripts: Victor Sant
  • Map effects scripts: Zeus81
  • Message system script: Yanfly
  • Message system script: Galv
  • Word wrap script: KilloZapit
